Pre-Game Insights: Ecuador and Venezuela appear ready for a fight in the Copa America 2024 Group B.
Ecuador will be led by Spanish manager Felix Sanchez, who took over the team in March 2023.
Key players for Ecuador include Moises Caicedo from Chelsea and Pervis Estupinan from Brighton.
Venezuela, under Argentine coach Fernando Batista, has been undefeated since the first round of World Cup qualifiers.
Key figures for Venezuela include Girona midfielder Yangel Herrera, captain Tomas Rincon, and all-time leading goal scorer Salomon Rondon.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between Ecuador and Venezuela is scheduled for 22/06/2024 at Levi’s® Stadium in Santa Clara, CA.
